reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one noting it hits at the ankle, and appreciate its flattering design that hugs curves in all the right places. The velvet material is praised for being a decent thickness, comfortable, and stretchy, while the color receives positive feedback. Customers describe the dress as well-made and sexy without being sleazy. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish velvet gown
items.body: This is really beautiful with the fit (form fitting mermaid style), very flattering and forgiving. The velvet is soft and overall really elegant. Super classy vibes. This is perfect for a black tie/gala event. There's beauty in simplicity as they say, and even though this is simply all black velvety fabric, it's one of the nicest dresses I've tried on, and I'm always on the hunt for my next best flattering fit. It looks great with a necklace for bling and heels to match. Read more
items.author: Penny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and flattering
items.body: Arrived in one day and wearable right out of the bag! This dress did not disappoint. The fabric is lovely in all ways. It’s soft and nice weight with stretch and the color is beautiful. It has a zipper down the back and it drapes beautifully. I’m 5’1” and 125 lbs and the medium is a perfect fit. On me it’s like a floor length gown but I don’t need to have it hemmed. I’m wearing it to a winter barn wedding and my boots look great with it. Im really glad I ordered it. It had to travel in my suitcase and this fabric was fabulous for that. Came out of the suitcase ready to wear. The fabric is soft and comfortable and not too hot. I received so many compliments on this dress, its color and the fabric itself. I would definitely recommend this dress!!! Read more
items.author: Mr. & Mrs. V.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bought for a Costume, might wear for Christmas too
items.body: Material is stretchy and light but not bad quality. Rather comfortable. I bought the size 18 and it fits as expected. I might need some shapewear because it makes my hips stick out funny but I'm a curvy girl. I am wearing a duster over it so I might skip the shapewear altogether because it will cover my problem areas. Makes me feel fancy. I bought this for an Alberta Haynes costume, and it will be perfect! Read more
items.author: Cayden

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ready for the holiday party!
items.body: I ordered this at the last minute for a company holiday party, tried it on after a few other options in my closet and it turned out to be the perfect choice! Great fit, the kick flare at the back doesn’t show up as well in pictures but it gives the dress that extra something. The stretchy velvet, the color, and the fit were all fabulous. Sexy and classy! Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Photos on Amazon do not do this dress justice!!
items.body: This dress is even cuter than photos show!! I only returned it because it is fancier than what I needed. This dress was super soft, very flexible material and I have a bit of a pouch on my lower stomach and this dress did a fairly good job of concealing it with all the gathers along the side. The dress is made to hug those curves of your body. This is definitely a fall or winter dress due to the material. It’s not overly thick, but definitely not see through whatsoever. I loved the color of this dress!! The quality seemed to be really good. I am 5’8”, 140 pounds, 39 hips, bra 34 DDD, and the size 8 (medium) fit perfectly!! The dress was not too short and no hemming needed. If I had a formal event, I would buy this again!! I really liked it. Read more
items.author: tom

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Should be new
items.body: Dress is very pretty and fits nicely. Height is 5 ft 3 inches and 179 pounds. The reason I gave it 3 stars was due to seemingly being a returned item, otherwise 4 stars. It did not arrive in its' original packaging. I will return. Read more
items.author: PDS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS DRESS!
items.body: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS DRESS! I was shopping for a wedding guest dress and had a different style in mind, but this dress kept coming up in my suggestions. Finally I ordered it if for no other reason than to rule it out. WRONG. It was so flattering and I felt so great in it. Comfy and stretchy but just overall almost the perfect dress. :) Read more
items.author: Deborah Tighe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You NEED this dress
items.body: I absolutely love this dress. It is so comfortable and stylish. I've gotten many compliments on the dress - wore it to a fundraiser gala. The velvet material is a decent thickness and the fit clings where it needs to. I want to buy more colors. Read more
items.author: Bharmening

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Mermaid Cocktail Maxi Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Mermaid Cocktail Maxi Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Olive Green, Apricot, Black, Navy Blue, Gray Blue, Dark Green, Red, Rose Red, Wine Red, Pink, Purple, Blue Green, Royal Blue, Bright Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
